comment.text: This text appears as an error message on the MCP server tile within the AI Settings portal. It informs the user that the MCP server is currently unavailable, likely displayed as a tooltip when an error state is detected. Translators should ensure the message accurately conveys the service outage.

usage.context:
<AiTile.Header
 title={name}
 hasError={item.needReset}
 getErrorTooltipContent={() => (
 <Text fontSize="12px" lineHeight="16px">
 {t("AISettings:MCPUnavailableError")}
 </Text>
 )}
 >
 <div className={styles.buttonsContainer}>
 <ToggleButton
